channel.title: Log In Error
channel.description:
ok well i used to host a server till one day no1 could log in, and i ended up rage deleting. But now my friends have asked me to rebuild my server so they can maybe play again. But this error keeps coming to everyone that tries to log in bar me, because i use "localhost" to log in. Ive portfowarded multiply times correctly, and fully setup my no-ip. But it still seems to get the error. This is why i came here to see if anyone has an idea on "why no one can log in" and "how can i fix the problem"
thank-you, .: slevins :.

item.title: Log In Error
item.dc:creator: @slevins slevins
item.description:
@slevins wrote:

yeh thats what one of my friends said, but ive checked both twice and there both ok. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 01, 2008, 04:44:25 am[/size][hr]Can any1 help with this cause i really want some of my friends to come on and tell us what more they want

Read full topic

item.title: Log In Error
item.dc:creator: @SkillersDream SkillersDream
item.description:
@SkillersDream wrote:

You Couldn’t Of Did Portforwarding/No-ip Right Or It would Work
